casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Avery Joe LAIL, Jr. 47P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Lail, Avery Joe (Jr.).

James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill.

David J. Adinolfi, II, Special Deputy Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of February 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
